prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_AF01",
  "name": "Family AirFryer Weeknight Wins",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat",
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "SemiPrepared"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Air Fryer Meatball Melt Subs & Green Beans",
  "description": "Crispy air-fried beef meatballs stuffed into toasted ciabatta with warm tomato sauce and melty mozzarella, plus quick garlicky green beans. A fast, kid-friendly weeknight combo.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat air fryer to 200°C/400°F for 3 minutes.",
    "Split 4 ciabatta rolls lengthwise.",
    "Shred or slice mozzarella cheese if needed.",
    "Toss green beans with olive oil, garlic and herb seasoning, and a pinch of salt.",
    "Place tomato pasta sauce in a microwave-safe bowl."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Air fry beef meatballs in the basket for 6–8 minutes, shaking halfway, until browned and heated through.",
    "Air fry the seasoned green beans in the basket (or on a lined tray) for 6–8 minutes until crisp-tender; shake once.",
    "Microwave tomato pasta sauce for 60–90 seconds until hot; stir.",
    "Lightly air fry the split ciabatta rolls, cut side up, for 1–2 minutes to warm.",
    "Assemble subs: place meatballs on rolls, spoon over tomato pasta sauce, and top with mozzarella cheese.",
    "Return assembled subs to the air fryer for 1–2 minutes until cheese melts.",
    "Serve subs with the green beans on the side."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "beef meatballs",
      "quantity": "16 meatballs (about 500 g)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "ciabatta rolls",
      "quantity": "4 rolls",
      "preparation": "split"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato pasta sauce",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mozzarella cheese",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "shredded"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "green beans",
      "quantity": "400 g",
      "preparation": "trimmed if needed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic and herb seasoning",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "Pinch, to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "American",
      "Italian"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer",
      "Microwave"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
